metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17514 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** boxes.c in nip2 8.4.0 does not validate strings before launching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, which might allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via a crafted URL. NOTE: a software maintainer indicates that this product does not use the BROWSER environment variable.

criterions.comment: nip2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
